body:
Ive been in the used pc market for a little less than a year now so I have a pretty good knowledge of good deals and what to stay away from.

(this build features a prebuilt dell with a 1050 :D )

So I have made up a build with a i5 processor with the NEW 1050 !!!
The i5 is a i5-2400 which if overclocked can power through games! 
The graphics card is a Zotac 1050 mini which can tank through ANY game with high settings, gta 5 runs at 100 + fps high settings!
For 200 dollars you can not find a better deal especially if you buy new. (maybe if you find better deals bidding)

So here are the links! 
The main powerhouse (Dell optiplex 790, Buy it now for $100!)
http://www.ebay.com/itm/Dell-Optiplex-790-Tower-i5-2400-3-10GHz-4GHz-250GB-HDD-Desktop-DVD-Rom-/1622...
Feel free to upgrade the ram, hard drive and overclock the cpu!

Now for the Zotac 1050 Mini!
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814500412&ignorebbr=1&nm_mc=KNC-GoogleAdwords-...


There you go, have fun!

title: $210 PC Plays all triple A games 1080p60fps+
